Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'The last bloom of blood withers, and heavy, rotting flesh collapses into a pool of still water.'}
{3: 'Warm candlelight flickers through the trees, listening to the silent grief of those who died without a voice. It guides their unwilling souls toward peace.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Pestilence"', 3: "Six hundred seventy-two. Carson Deller. Sleep now. I've remembered your story. Your life was not in vain.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The Pestilence Knight cradles the lantern as the flame slowly fades. It closes like a sleeping child's eyes, silent and still."}
{2: '"Pestilence"', 3: 'They have fallen into slumber.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He closes the lantern cover and speaks softly.'}
{2: "You've taken on the weight of their souls, for now.", 3: '11'}
{3: 'The knight glances at the bloodstained forest floor, then turns away, unable to bear the sight.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Pestilence"', 3: 'I gave them one last dream. It was short, but the soul remembers.', 4: '1'}
{2: '"Pestilence"', 3: "This way, they won't have to suffer the torment of memory while they sleep.", 4: '1'}
{2: '"Pestilence"', 3: "If the laws of life and death can be rewritten, then maybe they can return to the Acheron River's womb and be born again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He lowers his mask again. At some point, the herbal scent in the mist has faded without him noticing.'}
{3: 'The silver-haired young man has barely set down his lantern before he begins coughing, hand pressed to his mouth.'}
{3: 'You hurry forward and sit down beside him under the tree.'}
{2: "You've used too much magic. Your soul can't take this kind of strain.", 3: '28'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "It's alright. I just... need a little rest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He tries to show you a reassuring smile, but cold sweat is already beading across his forehead.'}
{2: "Don't push yourself. The power granted by the Blood Covenant is tied to your deepest, truest desire. You have to stay in control of your mind.", 3: '33'}
{2: 'The more you resist it, the more painful it becomes.', 3: '34'}
{3: 'Wanshi nods. His breathing slows a little, but his voice remains hoarse and strained.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'll do my best to keep it under control.", 4: '1'}
{3: "He's already drunk half a pot of water in one go, but his chest only rises and falls harder than before."}
{3: "Seeing how pale he's become, you make a decisive call."}
{2: "One body can't carry so many souls.", 3: '40'}
{2: "Link with me. I'll help you bear the weight.", 3: '41'}
{3: "A flicker of hesitation flashes in his golden eyes, but it's quickly replaced by trust."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Alright. But promise me... don't go too deep.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'll protect you in the dream. But you have to protect yourself too.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With your promises exchanged, there's nothing more to say. You lean back against the tree, close your eyes, and fall into the dream."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory928.png'}
{3: "Blood. Fire. Screams. Everything you've felt in your dreams before floods through your limbs again."}
{3: "Your soul trembles like a kite tangled in power lines, shivering in the downpour. No matter how much you struggle to move forward, you're frozen in place."}
{3: 'Swarms of bloodsucking locusts block out the sky. The sun pulses weakly in the red haze above. Everything you see is drowned in blood.'}
{1: '1', 3: "From behind, a child's voice calls out. When you turn around, you see several barefoot children running across the wasteland, holding hands."}
{3: 'A child stumbles and falls during the escape. The scent of blood draws several locusts crawling toward him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Child', 3: "Don't just sit there. Move!", 4: '1'}
{3: "The child's companions call out from a nearby hill, shouting in panic. But the child trapped in the swarm of locusts stays frozen, paralyzed by fear."}
{2: '(Run forward)', 3: '82'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront31.png', 4: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 4: '7'}
{1: '1', 3: "You reach out to grab the child's hand, but your fingers pass straight through his body, sinking into the burst of blood blooming from his chest."}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{2: 'The Child Devoured by Locusts', 3: 'Ahhh, ahhhhhhh, ahhh——————', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 4: '7', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront31.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{3: "In an instant, the child's body is torn to shreds. All that's left is a withered husk."}
{3: 'The bloated locusts retract their feeding tubes, then spread their wings and fly off toward the next scream.'}
{3: 'Cries of anguish and mourning melt into the blood flowing across the ground. Suffering spreads through the land like a plague.'}
{2: '(Is this the past Wanshi spoke of...?)', 3: '110'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory928.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory928.png'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'In the red glow that smothers the sky, a massive pale hand descends from above, pressing down on the shaking earth.'}
{3: 'A low, agonized moan rises from beneath the ground, making every living thing tremble.'}
{3: 'Looking up, a giant wrapped in white light rises between the mountains, bellowing toward the crimson sun.'}
{3: "The giant's steps shake the whole plain. Trees shudder. Peaks tremble. The land roars with every step."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Child', 3: "No, no, don't chase me! What the hell is that thing?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child', 3: "Help! First the blood locusts, now a giant? This world's gone insane! Ahhhhh!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: "Suddenly, a different memory crashes into your mind. A sharp pain pierces your chest as if you've been stabbed, but it's quickly pulled away by a surge of warm white light."}
{3: "Once you come to, you realize what just happened: you accidentally tapped into a child's final memories, right before their death."}
{2: '(Was that Wanshi, protecting me... keeping me from falling in too deep?)', 3: '144'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory928.png'}
{3: "But the nightmare doesn't stop. The blood locusts shriek endlessly, wave after wave flooding across the red-stained plains."}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor3Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor3Shake'}
{3: 'One by one, the children nearby fall. Some are dragged off by locusts. Others collapse where they stand, never getting back up.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Woman in White', 3: "...I'm sorry. It's all my fault... I couldn't hold them back...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Far across the field, another woman in white lies in a pool of blood, clutching a twisted candlestick. On her knees, she bows over the children's corpses, apologizing again and again."}
{2: 'Woman in White', 3: 'Please... gods above, demons below... anyone... have mercy... just let one of them survive...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Woman in White', 3: "They didn't do anything wrong...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}

{3: "The blood locusts don't understand her prayers. They stir once more, lifting into the air and swarming toward the approaching giant. Crawling over his body like ants, they form a coat of living black armor."}
{3: "And the child<//human> standing at the giant's feet can only clutch their throbbing forehead, staring blankly at the unfolding nightmare."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'A quiet sigh brushes past your ears.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "After seeing this again and again, I truly don't know where humanity's path lies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Even if they manage to escape this prison of blood today, what about tomorrow?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'A year from now... ten years from now... must they always watch the ones they love die in pools of blood?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Devoured like insects, only to bring new lives into a world of more suffering... is that the future humans are fated to endure?', 4: '1'}
{1: "If everything we've just witnessed is judgment passed down from the Sanctuary,", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '-3', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Then God, what sin have I committed? How do I atone for it?', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 10: '1'}
{1: "I beg you... if I can't be saved, then at least show me a path forward.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 10: '1'}
{1: 'I will walk it, with devotion, into the arms of sweet death.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: "Wanshi opens his eyes. You're asleep beside him, slumped gently against his shoulder."}
{3: "He nudges you slightly, but your brow only furrows deeper. You're completely out."}
{3: "Seeing this, he doesn't disturb you further. He quietly pulls his coat over your shoulders, then takes up his lantern and walks away from the tree."}
{3: 'The man lying in the center of the woods still stares blankly at the sky. His eyes are hollow, his face frozen in a twisted grimace.'}
{3: 'All around, hanging from the trees, are the shriveled remains of his companions, every one of them drained dry.'}
{3: "The silver-haired youth kneels beside the man and gently closes his eyelids. Then, he presses his index finger against the man's forehead."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieLianyi.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'A rush of fragmented, chaotic memories tears through his mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory634.jpg'}
{3: 'Somewhere, in a pitch-black ritual chamber underground, dozens of people in tribal clothing gather around a bonfire, whispering chants in unison.'}
{3: 'The man stands solemnly at the center, raising a candlestick high and shouting over their murmurs.'}
{2: 'Priest', 3: 'We return our bodies to the abyss and forge our souls into spears for Carcosa to wield.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Priest', 3: 'Tell me now, in choosing this path of redemption, do you carry any regret?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Those on the altar raise both arms high and answer him with fierce, burning conviction.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Followers', 3: 'No regrets! We have no regrets!', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Priest', 3: 'Good. Let the ritual begin.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The priest steps toward the girl tied to the ground and raises a sharp blade overhead.'}
{3: "The child's nose and mouth are sealed. Tears stream from her eyes as she tries to crawl backward, but her body won't respond."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Priest', 3: 'May you be blessed by the earth in your next life.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tribespeople shed their outer robes, revealing pentagrams drawn across their bare chests.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Priest', 3: 'The time for the offering is now!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "As soon as he finishes speaking, the believers turn their blades on themselves. In perfect sync, they cut their own throats without a moment's doubt."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 3: '1', 4: '5'}
{3: 'SWOOSH—'}
{3: 'Blood splashes onto the altar floor, running through hidden channels and forming strange red-brown runes.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Dozens of bodies fall lifeless to the ground, no longer tethered by consciousness. They become new offerings.'}
{3: 'The once-living flesh fades into stillness in an instant. Yet the ritual site remains eerily silent, unchanged.'}
{3: "The bound girl puzzles over why she's still alive. From the silence and darkness, another slender figure steps forward."}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Ashlar. This ritual has failed too.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canary', 3: 'So what will you do next?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The white-haired girl lifts her skull mask, revealing a clean, emotionless face beneath it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: "Holy Maiden, the magic in their blood must not have been strong enough. But it's fine. We still have one more offering.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'That child was handpicked by me. Her magic levels are extremely high. One more trial should be enough to confirm it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ashlar points to the little girl tied beneath the altar. She begins to squirm and whimper in protest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canary', 3: "Enough. You've already killed plenty of outsiders in that castle. It got us nothing but unwanted attention.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Canary, whom Ashlar reveres as the "Holy Maiden", kneels and gently closes the eyes of her fallen kin one by one, her face full of compassionate sorrow.'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: "Don't let outsider blood defile this sacred place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'Then let me be the sacrifice this time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The black-robed man draws the bone knife again, but this time he turns the tip toward his own chest.'}
{3: "The Holy Maiden's voice tightens, showing a flicker of anger, but Ashlar stands firm."}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "Holy Maiden. We're out of time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "The castle has fallen. They'll find this place soon. We have to discover the true summoning method before that happens.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "If unclean blood can't touch the primordial altar, then let me offer myself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He pauses briefly, but the weight of responsibility pushes him forward.'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "...Holy Maiden, please. As the tribe's final ember, you must complete this mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The white-haired Holy Maiden doesn't look at him. She lifts her chin and accepts the burden in silence."}
{2: 'Canary', 3: 'I understand. I will carry on your will.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: 'No matter how long it takes, I swear I will find a way to reach Carcosa.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: 'The Haruka people<//tribespeople>... will rise again on this land.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ashlar nods and says nothing more. Without hesitation, he drives a bone knife into his own chest.'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory634.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.3', 5: '0'}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory634.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.4', 5: '0'}

{3: "His body falls with a heavy thud. His vision spins as he collapses, and all he can see is warm blood flooding from his palm, the reddish-brown liquid running into the grooves of the altar's design."}
{3: 'Flames burn at the edge of his sight, dancing wildly for a moment, as if stirred by the collapse of their owner.'}
{2: "Canary's Voice", 3: "...The flames! The altar is reacting to Ashlar's blood!"}
{3: "Canary's delighted cry reaches his ears, but he no longer has the strength to look at her expression."}
{3: 'The warmth is quickly leaving his body, yet something inside his chest burns even brighter.'}
{2: 'Ashlar', 3: "(Good... we've finally found the key to redemption...)"}
{3: "Just before the memory ends, the bound girl stares at the memory's owner with terrified eyes, her pale face filled with despair."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHuiyisha01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Six hundred seventy-three. Ashlar. A memory soaked in madness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Sleep. I have no right to forgive your sins, but your life is over. The ferryman of the Styx will weigh the weight of your crimes.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The Pestilence Knight puts away his lantern and stands. He looks up at the corpses hanging in the trees. They're the same group of believers he saw in the memory."}

{3: 'But unlike the earlier murder victims, these all bear identical, self-inflicted slashes across their throats. The angle, the force—everything is the same. As if, in the moment they chose to die, they all shared a single soul.'}
{3: 'Wanshi lowers his gaze in silence. The scene he once witnessed in the castle floods back into his mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory638.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Moonshade belladonna, silver-veined poppy, delirium mint... all plants that excite the mind and twist vision.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'So the tribe even has a drug specialist... The situation is worse than that traveler described.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: "The mad cultists... the herbal scent that keeps returning... the girl who suddenly appeared in the castle's hidden passage..."}
{3: 'It all clicks into place in his mind.'}
{3: 'Crack—footsteps crushing dry leaves echo from behind.'}
{3: "Sensing danger, he lifts his revolver and turns around. Out of the thick fog steps the white-haired girl, the one he'd seen once before."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canary', 3: "Plague Knight... I never imagined you'd gain that kind of power.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She smiles at you—gentle, obedient, just like she did the first time you met.'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: "If I'd known, I would have made sure to finish you off properly.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The revolver's chamber spins. The bullets are loaded. What greets her now is nothing like before."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Your goal... is it to become Carcosa and bring catastrophe to the world?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canary', 3: "No, you're wrong. Carcosa has nothing to do with the catastrophe.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl tilts her head as she strolls closer, a heavy herbal scent clinging to her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canary', 3: 'You outsiders are the ones who imagined a connection between Carcosa and the catastrophe...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: 'Carcosa is sacred. It was never meant to be understood or touched by tainted blood.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Then what is Carcosa?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canary', 3: "It's this land itself, soaked in innocent blood.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Canary stops walking. Beneath the goat skull mask, her eyes finally reveal open, murderous intent.'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: 'Even now, standing here, none of you remembers what happened on this ground?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Canary', 3: 'Centuries ago, the tribespeople<//Haruka> knelt here, begging you not to attack. They pleaded for mercy, that you would at least spare the children who had no idea what was happening...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: 'And now, centuries later, the laws are broken, the catastrophe has come, and you<//outsiders> are the ones being hunted. Only now do you realize it was never fair?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Canary', 3: 'Hahaha... You humans<//outsiders> really are selfish creatures!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Laughing madly, the girl grabs the skull on her head. Her shrieking laughter fills the air as columns of gray-black mist shoot from behind her and strike at you.'}
{3: "The black fog reeks of poison herbs. It slams into you and coils around your body like a vortex, but it doesn't hold for long."}
{3: "In the next instant, a blue light shines from the center of the storm. The lantern in the knight's hand absorbs all the dark mist summoned by forbidden magic."}
{1: '1', 2: '"Pestilence Knight"', 3: 'The knight raises the gun in his hand.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The knight raises the gunlance in his hand.'}
{2: '"Pestilence Knight"', 3: "Then I'll have no choice but to fight you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Canary', 3: "Fine. That's what I was hoping for.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She crouches low, her fingers curled like claws. Letting out a beastlike roar, she charges toward you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieDao.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Wanshi sidesteps and raises his weapon to block the claws slicing through the air, but as the girl brushes past him, her body disappears into the thick fog.'}
{2: '"Pestilence Knight"', 3: '—Gray Raven!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi scans the area. In that instant, he realizes who Canary is targeting. He spins and fires several shots into the mist, but every one of them misses.'}
{3: 'Thud. Swish.'}
{3: 'Footsteps echo as they retreat through the dense fog.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{3: 'A moment later, the mist dissipates. As the air clears, the figure that had been resting beneath the tree is already gone.'}
